sentences.en: a bill of $3,200 for services rendered
sentences.cn: 一张3,200美元服务费的账单

sentences.en: A small difference between them will render the composite translucent.
sentences.cn: 微小的差别,也会使复合材料变成半透明.

sentences.en: an obligation to render assistance to those in need
sentences.cn: 为有困难的人提供援助的义务

sentences.en: Any assistance you can render him will be appreciated.
sentences.cn: 无论给予他何种帮助，他都会非常感激。

sentences.en: At last, the citizens were forced to render up their town.
sentences.cn: 最后, 市民们不得不把城市放弃.

sentences.en: He was rendered almost speechless by the news.
sentences.cn: 听到这个消息他几乎说不出话来。

sentences.en: I must render down this fat; we are short of lard.
sentences.cn: 我得把这块肥肉熬成油, 我们正缺猪油.

sentences.en: It contained so many errors as to render it worthless.
sentences.cn: 它错误太多，所以毫无用处。

sentences.en: She needed him to hear her out and render advice.
sentences.cn: 她需要他把话听完并提出建议.

sentences.en: The Board had been slow to render its verdict.
sentences.cn: 董事会迟迟未能作出决定。

sentences.en: The complex administrative arrangements render the decision - making process somewhat opaque.
sentences.cn: 复杂的行政协商使决策过程透明度不高.

sentences.en: The villagers were expected to render part of their crops for the lord's protection.
sentences.cn: 村民们被要求用他们的部分谷物来报偿领主的保护.

sentences.en: They will render blow for blow.
To their deliverer the poets paid the greatest tribute they could render.
sentences.cn: 诗人们竭尽全力地赞颂自己的拯救者.

sentences.en: We are going to render them economic assistance.
sentences.cn: 我们打算向他们提供经济援助.

sentences.en: We can render down this fat.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把这块肥肉熬成油.

sentences.en: You can render the chicken down to make stock for soup.
sentences.cn: 你可以把这只鸡做成汤料.

sentences.en: You will have to render an account of your expenditure.

words.tran_cn: 翻译；表现；表演；描写；打底；（建筑物等）透视图

trans.tran_cn: 致使，造成，给予，递交，翻译，表达，粉刷
trans.tran_en: to give something to someone or do something, because it is your duty or because someone expects you to

trans.tran_cn: 发出， 开出； 使得， 致使； 给予， 提供； 翻译
trans.tran_en: to give something to someone or do something, because it is your duty or because someone expects you to
